thread.title: Scouts size up NHLs rookie crop for 2015-16 season - NHL
thread.title_full: Scouts size up NHLs rookie crop for 2015-16 season - NHL - SI.com

author: Allan Muir
title: Scouts size up NHLs rookie crop for 2015-16 season - NHL
text:
by Allan Muir Twitter Email Posted: Thu Oct. 8, 2015
Despite the volume of hype centered around the top-two picks of the 2015 draft, there’s more to this season’s rookie class than Connor McDavid and Jack Eichel. We asked three scouts for their impressions of some of the youngsters who are hoping to make the most of their spots on NHL rosters. Here’s what they had to say: NHL The Seventh Coming: Connor McDavid's hockey throne awaits by Austin Murphy
